name: Sterio
text:
Alright Papa, Mama,
we'll be off~!

name: Canes
text:
See you... hey, Sterio,
watch where you're going, you'll bump into someone!
This isn't our neighborhood-

name: Father
text:
They've grown so big,
traveling to other star systems away from their parents.

name: Mother
text:
What are you talking about?
In our settlement, those children are grown adults,
it's not uncommon for them to travel without their parents.

name: Mother
text:
Listen, you, Canes and Sterio
are old enough to make their own decisions
and take responsibility.

name: Mother
text:
Besides, Sterio's species
grows much faster than ours.
Actual years don't count for anything.

name: Mother
text:
So... don't treat those children
like kids forever.

name: Father
text:
Even so, I can't get used to it~!
On Earth, they'd still be at an age where
they're playing and living with their parents, you know?

name: Father
text:
Besides, you yourself
took care of almost all the preparations
for this trip, didn't you!

name: Mother
text:
Ugh... well, that's true.
We both have to
be careful.

name: Father
text:
It's tough. Even if they're adults by societal standards,
no matter how old Canes and Sterio get,
they're still our children.

name: Father
text:
Hey, do you remember? The day
they first went hunting... for a moment I looked away
and both of them got lost.

name: Father
text:
Maybe it's because of that day
that I can't shake off the feeling
of treating them like children.

name: Mother
text:
That time, I was terrified too.
But we found them thanks to Sterio
blowing his "favorite".

name: Father
text:
His horn, huh... that kid, from the time he was a baby,
he'd get happy if I just blew that,
it made things easy.

name: Father
text:
On Muiraoka I, there aren't even
instrument shops yet, so it's a flimsy toy
that I carved-

name: Father
text:
But if it makes him happy,
I feel like making as many as he wants.

name: Mother
text:
You know... don't always fuss over
Sterio like that,
treat your siblings equally.

name: Father
text:
I know, I know.
As parents, both of them are cute,
promising kids.

name: Mother
text:
...But you don't intend to
tie those children
to our 'house,' do you?

name: Father
text:
Of course not. I want them to experience many things,
and feel that they have many futures
ahead of them-

name: Father
text:
And if, after that, they love our family business
and want to inherit it, they're more than welcome.

name: Father
text:
If they only want to be heroes,
that's fine too.
I'll support them with all my might.

name: Mother
text:
Before that... we need to tell Canes
about that matter.
Those children are already adults.

name: Mother
text:
I'm worried that we've procrastinated
until today.

name: Father
text:
...That's right.
When they come back,
let's talk to them properly.

name: Father
text:
Anyway, for now-
go play and learn all you can at Hero Festa.
Canes, Sterio.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
[Player], thank you for today.
Despite everything that happened,
we safely finished the first day, yes!

After the first day of Hero Festa ended,
the man who had removed his "Rokusei" mask
walks through the night city with [Player].

options.text: I'm glad there were no injuries.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text: That's right, even though my suit exploded so spectacularly, it's surprising that I myself was completely unharmed.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's safe, safe!
I didn't get injured anywhere.
The suit flying off was just a dream, right?

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Oh, President Huckle's
stealing the spotlight really helped.
I owe him another favor.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
But a lot happened today, didn't it?
I also met energetic customers-
Canes-kun and Sterio-kun, was it?

name: Tsuneaki
text:
It's heartwarming to see
them talk so happily about their siblings and
life back home.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
I don't have close siblings, and
I've hardly ever gone out with my family,
so I feel that even more.

options.text: Didn't you get to play around in Shinraku either?

text:
Tsuneaki looks back on his past-
his life in "Shinraku," in southern Kyoto Prefecture,
which had recovered from monster attacks.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
First of all, when I was a child,
I found the city of Shinraku stifling,
so I didn't willingly go out to play.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
...Except when I sneaked into
that person's mansion
beyond the outskirts of town.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Looking back, I was a brat.
I think I was constantly angry
and irritated with everyone around me.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
People in the next town didn't treat me as an equal,
and my parents and everyone in Shinraku
didn't object to that treatment.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
I couldn't accept the attitude of the adults in that closed world,
and most of all, my own half-hearted existence-

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Because I lived each day with such feelings,
I only felt like going out when I was invited
for neighborhood gatherings.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
To tell you the truth... I only became
familiar with the city of Shinraku
after I grew up.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
When I was a child, it was as I just said,
and after parting with my mentor, I was solely
immersed in "studying for the future".

name: Tsuneaki
text:
After becoming a hero and joining my current workplace,
at first I just pretended to "love my hometown!"
like my mentor.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
And as I actually visited the tourist spots in Shinraku
and worked as a local actor...
I truly came to love that city.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
I even came to think, "It would have been amazing if I had
played around in this wonderful place when I was a child."
It's too late now, though.

Continuing to talk, Tsuneaki walks through
the city of Orient City and looks at the Hero Festa
building still visible nearby.

He recalls the city built next to a warm beach,
a tourist destination for the entire city, and
the smiles of the visitors.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
I don't intend to regret anything, but
when I see Canes-kun and Sterio-kun,
I can't help but think.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
If my circumstances were different,
would I have had a youth where I, like them,
would sparkle at everything I saw-

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Would I have been much closer
to my classmates, the people in town, and my parents
than I am now...?

name: Tsuneaki
text:
In fact, I might have even enjoyed leisure
in a seaside town, like the people
who came to Hero Festa.

options.text: I don't think it's too late now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, are you saying "eternal youth"?
That's quite an old-man-ish thought~
Are you starting to be a bit like me?
Tsuneaki laughs a little playfully.

options.text: But you might not have met me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...That might be true.
Because of those experiences, I became a hero, and I met you, [Player].
Tsuneaki smiles at his interlocutor, like cherishing something irreplaceable to him.

text:
When the conversation paused,
Tsuneaki stops and
turns to face [Player].

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Sorry, [Player].
It's after work, and I'm making
you listen to my boring complaints.

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Here, this is a token of my greeting to your company.
It's a delicious snack and matcha set I chose from "my hometown".

options.text: Thank you very much for your kindness.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
This old man has been working for decades, you know?
Of course, I have to prepare souvenirs for the agency I'm indebted to.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tsuneaki
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, [Player], if I had known that you were the "Observer", I would have chosen something a bit more thoughtful.
Anyway-

name: Tsuneaki
text:
Take this home and forget what I just said!
Well then, I look forward to working with you again tomorrow.
Good night~!

As if to avoid further interaction,
Tsuneaki waves goodbye to [Player]
and quickly leaves the spot.

dialogue_after_selection.text: Chasing the running man's back, you lose sight of him after he turns the corner.

text:
Having parted with Tsuneaki,
[Player] heads to their accommodation,
preparing for tomorrow.

And the next day-
the Hero Festa venue was bustling with
a different kind of energy than the first day.

name: Loren
text:
Whoa, whoa, whoa!
What is this? Did I
mess up again?

name: Loren
text:
I just had it repaired,
what's going on with
this hero suit!?

name: Apprentice
text:
Are you okay, Loren-san?
Um... something
terrible is happening!

name: Heel Wrestler
text:
Leave the vanguard to us.
We'll protect you from any broadcast accidents!

name: Loren
text:
I'm sorry everyone...
I'll also stay as far away from the cameras as possible
and continue to provide support!

name: Live Watchers
text:
Hey... the live show happening at
Hero Festa venue
is getting weird, isn't it?

name: Live Watchers
text:
Oh, it's true!
It's called "Surprise," so it must be
some kind of prank, right?

name: Live Watchers
text:
That's why they made them wear
Festa-specific hero suits, right?
It's definitely staged!

name: Live Watchers
text:
Oh, man, if there was an event like this,
I should have taken a paid leave and
gone to Hero Festa...

name: Goro
text:
Hahahahaha!
What is this hero suit,
it's crazy!

name: Goro
text:
It's useless in real combat, but
to liven up the festival, this much
is just right, isn't it?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Is that... how it is?
I don't quite understand it, but-

name: Pubraseer
text:
If the people supporting heroes
enjoy this performance,
then it must be good.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Alright, let's continue the battle.
I'll continue to handle the backup.

name: Goro
text:
...Phew, understood! Now, you apprentices,
we won't go easy on you
just because we're stripped bare, alright?

Visitors present at the surprise hero live show
surround the heroes and watch-

In other areas, they watch the live broadcast
on screens and enjoy their time
at Hero Festa.

name: Canes
text:
...Sometimes adults
become dumber than us.
Why is that, I wonder?

name: Sterio
text:
Papa and the neighbors,
they take off their clothes when they drink alcohol,
the same thing?

name: Canes
text:
Maybe so-
No, no, the heroes are working, so
I don't think they're drinking.

name: Canes
text:
Oh, right, I guess we too
are already considered "adults"
on Muiraoka I, aren't we...?

name: Canes
text:
I still don't feel it at all.
Is this okay?
Should I consider living alone-

name: Sterio
text:
What~ Canes, you're leaving home!?
Why, why? Then
I'll live alone with you!

name: Canes
text:
No, I just thought about it.
I don't think I could
do something like that easily...

name: Canes
text:
Well, anyway, let's head to our
meeting place with Rokusei-san.

As various parts of the venue are filled with excitement,
[Player] was communicating via audio
with a certain staff member.

name: Management Staff
text:
Oh, I'm so sorry.
To tell you the truth, this accident
was completely unexpected for us too-

name: Management Staff
text:
The company that received the order for the special
comms devices also replied that
no such incidents occurred during test operations.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Management Staff
dialogue_after_selection.text: I apologize, for involving the heroes who protect citizens in such a situation-

dialogue_after_selection.name: Management Staff
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, it's not sarcasm, but rather they're happy?
Is that so...

options.text: Are you sure that it's not a feature?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Management Staff
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Your anger is completely understandable.
We also inquired with the supplier at the time the accident occurred yesterday-

dialogue_after_selection.name: Management Staff
dialogue_after_selection.text: Apparently, they had their subcontractor test it, and they said they don't have any more details than what's in the report.

name: Management Staff
text:
And, um, it's very difficult to say,
but I need to inform you about
the manager's decision...

The person on the other end of the line,
as the words suggest, pauses with difficulty
and reads out the message.

name: Management Staff
text:
It's very popular with the visitors,
so for now, the Surprise Hero Battle
will continue as is-

name: Management Staff
text:
In the unlikely event that monsters or villains
appear, the policy is to transform
with normal comms devices.

name: Management Staff
text:
If any other problems occur,
please contact us. We will provide
maximum support...

options.text: The staff must be caught in the middle too.

name: Rokusei
text:
[Player],
was that communication just now-

Rokusei, who had been waiting nearby for the communication to end,
listens to the details from [Player]... and is dumbfounded.

name: Rokusei
text:
Are you serious!?
Am I going to expose my indecent figure
every time the apprentices surround me!?

name: Rokusei
text:
This old man hasn't even
debuted as a gravure idol professionally,
and this is happening!

options.text: It's hard to battle like that...
You're going to do gravure? I'll buy it!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, I'm not, that's just a figure of speech!
Ah, but if you're looking forward to it, maybe I'll consider it...?

name: Rokusei
text:
However, special comms devices, huh?
Could it be that they're repurposed
technology that "our place" gave up on?

options.text: (Is this something I should be hearing...?)

text:
To [Player], who looks suspicious,
Rokusei lowers his voice and
continues the conversation.

name: Rokusei
text:
It's quite a while ago, and
I haven't seen the actual thing,
I just know the information-

name: Rokusei
text:
Apparently, at the Defense Bureau,
research was being conducted to improve the efficiency of
anti-monster combat and the accuracy of group operations.

name: Rokusei
text:
What was being prototyped there
was a device that could transform
those with hero aptitude into a uniform appearance.

name: Rokusei
text:
However, that research couldn't overcome various
challenges, and they had no choice
but to give up on practical application... or so I heard.

Saying that, Rokusei returns his voice
to its normal tone and smiles.

name: Rokusei
text:
Oh, this story itself is fine to tell publicly.
In fact, it's fairly well-known
in the hero industry-

name: Rokusei
text:
The research itself wasn't particularly hidden
and seems to have been conducted jointly
by the government and private sector.

name: Rokusei
text:
However, why is this know-how
being used in such a strange way
now?

name: Rokusei
text:
If you just accept that it's a device that can
transform heroes into any desired appearance
just by looking at them, regardless of the "Observer"-

name: Rokusei
text:
It can be fully utilized for
civilian entertainment like Hero Festa,
and it is an attractive feature.

Rokusei tilts his head.
However, he gives up thinking
after only a few seconds.

name: Rokusei
text:
Well, there's no point in me thinking about it!
I'm still going to be using the event's special
comms device, after all...

name: Rokusei
text:
That's right! Next time a hero show
starts, how about we try
running away with all our might?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're a good sport, [Player]!
It's a festival, so a little playfulness is allowed, right?

options.text: That sounds like it would be exciting too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right?
Even on variety shows, unexpected accidents can be popular, you know.

options.text: The suit might break from running...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is it that fragile!?
No, but it broke from the recoil of my punch, so, hmm...

text:
As [Player] and Rokusei
converse in a corner of the food area,
a cheerful voice soon reaches their ears.

name: Sterio
text:
Canes, over here!
I found [Player] and Rokusei~!

name: Rokusei
text:
Huh, that voice is Sterio-kun!
Where is he...? He wouldn't just
pounce on me with his usual energy again, would he?

name: Rokusei
text:
[Player], check your surroundings
to see where they're coming from-

name: Sterio & Canes
text: Hellooo!!

options.text: Let's greet from the front next time, okay?

name: Rokusei
text:
Hello... thank you
for such energetic greetings.
I almost lost my eardrums.

name: Canes
text:
S-sorry.
I was so excited to be introduced to heroes
that I got a bit carried away.

name: Sterio
text:
Earth has so many people,
it's always noisy everywhere.
I don't know if a normal voice will reach them.

name: Rokusei
text:
Is that how it is...?
I'm curious about what kind of environment
you two usually live in.

name: Rokusei
text:
Well, I'll ask about that later...
Let's move before the lunch
peak hour begins!
Chapter 3 - Seeds You Don't Sow Won't Grow

[Player] and the others enter a newly built
building in the food area
and search for the Justice Curry store.

At the very back of the row of food stalls along the wall,
they see the heroes who had found them first
and were waving.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Narihito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey [Player], what a coincidence!
I was covering Hero Festa when President called out to me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Huckle
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Good work. I happened to meet Narihito-kun on the way here.
Since we were here, I had him come along.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio & Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
H-hello.
……………

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh? You two, where's the energy you had when you talked to this old man earlier?
Are you nervous?

text:
While exchanging greetings,
Canes and Sterio gaze intently at one of them-

name: Sterio & Canes
text: It's Mighty Knuckle!

name: Mokdai
text:
Hello... what~!?
You two, how do you
know my hero name!?

name: Canes
text:
Why, Justice shouted that
during the live broadcast.
Others called you Mokdai, though.

name: Sterio
text:
President, when he transforms, his glasses disappear.
His hairstyle also changes. So I didn't know.
But Mighty Knuckle, you are always the same!

name: Mokdai
text:
I see, am I that easy to recognize?
Maybe I should wear glasses
like Narihito-san and President.

name: Narihito
text:
Hahaha, want to try changing your hairstyle too?
...Oh, sorry, introductions first.
I'm Karue Narihito from Taiyo Shinpo, nice to meet you.

While conversing with the boys,
Mokdai guides the visitors
to the seats he had secured earlier.

name: Mokdai
text:
It makes me happy when
ordinary people call me by my hero name...
Ugh, I'm glad I became a hero~!!

name: Huckle
text:
Haha, Mokdai-kun's feelings for heroes
are especially strong, so his emotions must be
even more intense.

name: Huckle
text:
Watching your interaction,
reminds me of the old days.
When I was getting used to being a hero-

name: Huckle
text:
A civilian who happened to know me
called out my hero name in the street,
just like now.

name: Huckle
text:
And even asked for a handshake...
Oh, sorry, I'll stop my story here.

name: Narihito
text:
Please tell me
in details later!!

name: Rokusei
text:
Ahahahaha! President Huckle
really lit a fire under Narihito-san.
This is going to be tough later, isn't it?

name: Narihito
text:
Oh, Rokusei-kun, can I have some of your time later?
I haven't even heard your agency yet,
I'll be sure to interview you thoroughly, rookie!

name: Rokusei
text:
Did I just dig
my own grave!?

Canes watches with interest as the acquaintances
chat and asks a question that came to mind
during their conversation.

name: Canes
text:
Um... Narihito-san,
are you a hero?
Or a reporter?

name: Narihito
text:
Both. I usually work as a reporter,
and I'm also a hero
affiliated with Broadcasters.

name: Sterio
text:
He's both a hero and a reporter...
Can we be both heroes and hunters?
Will Mama's words come true?

name: Narihito
text:
I see, you two aren't very familiar
with hero activities.
Alright, I'll explain in order.

To answer the questions that Canes and Sterio
ask one after another, Narihito
clears his throat lightly and continues speaking.

name: Narihito
text:
First, for the answer to your question-
at least in the Earth Sphere,
there are very few full-time heroes.

name: Narihito
text:
Battlefields against monsters and villains
are not always available, and
in that sense, it's an unstable job.

name: Narihito
text:
If there's no work, there's no income, and
besides, the timing of heroes' awakening
varies from person to person.

name: Narihito
text:
So, most often, people have a main job
to make a living, and engage in hero activities
as a side job.

name: Narihito
text:
I don't know if your mother knew that, but
heroes who "do both" are the mainstream.

name: Canes
text:
Doing both is the mainstream,
so to inherit the family business,
and become a hero...

name: Sterio
text:
Canes, we did it!
We'll do both, heroes and hunters,
together!

name: Canes
text:
...That's only if you can transform.
Yesterday, that comms device
didn't react at all.

Canes gives a blunt reply to Sterio's
happy words.
His expression looks somewhat stiff.

The boy, looking disappointed or perhaps deep in thought-
Narihito gently calls out to him
to elicit his words.

name: Narihito
text:
By the way, Canes-kun, why
do you want to be a hero?
Was there a particular motive?

name: Sterio
text:
I'm a hunting dog! My role is to support the hunter.
If Canes wants to be a hero,
it's natural for me to become one too!

name: Narihito
text:
I see, so that's what Sterio-kun thinks.
"It's natural to become one together"...
Could you tell me what that means?

To answer the question posed to Sterio,
as if the siblings were covering for each other,
Canes began to speak.

name: Canes
text:
Sterio's word "hunting dog"
originated on Earth.
But actually, it doesn't refer to dogs-

name: Canes
text:
Regardless of species, people who live
together in a "house" to support hunters
are all called "hunting dogs."

name: Rokusei
text:
In Canes-kun and Sterio-kun's case,
they fulfill that role in their family
while also being siblings, right?

name: Sterio
text:
That's right, Rokusei, you are smart!
I've been family with Canes
ever since I was born.

name: Sterio
text:
Canes is amazing!
Strong, smart,
and even makes snacks for me-

name: Canes
text:
Whoa, stop it, you idiot!
Don't brag about our family here,
it's embarrassing!

name: Sterio
text:
Why, why?
Papa and Mama always say
we're their pride and joy.

name: Canes
text:
That's just parental love!
I'm still just an apprentice, and I have nothing
to brag about in front of a hero, you know?

name: Canes
text:
Besides, Sterio is
much stronger than me.
So even if you praise me like that...

options.text: I'm envious of their close sibling relationship.

text:
Canes notices the surrounding gazes
watching the siblings' interaction with warmth
and snaps back to reality.

name: Canes
text:
Oh! Sorry! I got sidetracked.
Um, what were we talking about-
Right, it was about Sterio!

name: Canes
text:
Anyway, his role is to
believe that if I want to be a hero,
he'll aim for it with me.

options.text: There are all kinds of families and jobs in space.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Narihito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I see... that's a wonderful story.
Next, could you tell me why Canes-kun wants to be a hero?
Upon Narihito's question, Canes opens his mouth, looking a little hesitant.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Narihito
dialogue_after_selection.text: I see... that's a wonderful story. Next, could you tell me why Canes-kun wants to be a hero?
Upon Narihito's question, Canes opens his mouth, looking a little hesitant.

options.text: Canes-kun, why do you want to be a hero?

dialogue_after_selection.text: Upon [Player]'s question, Canes opens his mouth, looking a little hesitant.

name: Canes
text:
In "LIVE@HERO" broadcasts,
people of various races and body types
are active, aren't they?

name: Canes
text:
Heroes much smaller than me
are knocking down villains many times their size-

name: Canes
text:
Even if they're not good at fighting,
there are heroes who are active in
civilian rescue and logistical support.

name: Canes
text:
I admired heroes who could be useful to someone
like that... and I thought
I wanted to become one too.

The surrounding heroes listen to
the boy's words with smiles.
No one denied his dream.
-Except for Canes himself.

name: Canes
text:
But a half-hearted wish like this won't do, right?
Both Sterio and I are just
thinking we want to be heroes-

name: Canes
text:
Actually, [Player]'s
comms device didn't
react at all.

options.text: I don't think 'won't do' is right...
Why doesn't it react, I wonder?

text:
Sterio looks worriedly at Canes,
who has fallen silent.

It was the heroes who shared similar wishes
who advised the two.

name: Mokdai
text:
...No, I don't think Canes-kun and Sterio-kun's
wishes are half-hearted.

name: Narihito
text:
I agree with Mokdai-kun.
In the first place, we ourselves are
"those who became heroes out of admiration."

name: Canes
text:
Eh... is that so!?
Narihito-san,
even you too, M-Mokdai-san?

Narihito and Mokdai nod with smiles
at the wide-eyed boy.

name: Mokdai
text:
In the past, I admired heroes,
but I convinced myself that I could never
become one.

name: Mokdai
text:
But after various things happened, I was able to
have you call me by my hero name like this.

name: Mokdai
text:
It's thanks to my colleagues at the agency,
Akashi and [Player]-

name: Mokdai
text:
If there's one thing I tried hard at,
it's that I couldn't turn away
from my true wish deep down.

name: Mokdai
text:
When a dream is big,
doesn't the feeling that it's impossible
also grow bigger?

name: Mokdai
text:
Still, not giving up
takes a lot of courage, but
only you can do it for yourself.

name: Mokdai
text:
I don't want to irresponsibly say that your wish
will definitely come true, but...
I believe your dream will surely come true.

name: Huckle
text:
The mechanism by which heroes awaken
has not been fully elucidated.
I'm frustrated that I can't answer your questions.

name: Huckle
text:
All we can do is, as Mokdai-kun said,
believe together.
We're rooting for you, Canes-kun, Sterio-kun.

name: Narihito
text:
Hey, if you two can become heroes,
will you tell me first?
I'll be eagerly waiting!

options.text: Narihito-san, you're getting ahead of yourself!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Narihito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, it's just right to speak up now.
I believe they can surely awaken, too!

name: Canes
text:
...Yes.
Thank you, everyone.

Canes and Sterio
slightly soften their expressions
at the advice of the active heroes.

name: Rokusei
text:
No worries, you two.
Even I'm this old, but
I'm still a rookie hero, you know?

name: Rokusei
text:
At your age, you still have a long way to go,
so you can take your time thinking about it.

name: Rokusei
text:
...Huh?
What's wrong, you two-

At that moment, an unfamiliar alarm
sounded from the speakers throughout the building.

It wasn't announcing a surprise hero live show,
but clearly indicated an emergency.

name: Emergency Broadcast
text:
Monsters sighted, monsters sighted,
all visitors please follow staff instructions
and evacuate immediately!

name: Emergency Broadcast
text:
Heroes are requested to cooperate with the management office
and carry out subjugation and evacuation guidance.

name: Mokdai
text:
What, monsters at a time like this!?
I still have more to say, but Canes-kun and
Sterio-kun, let's evacuate with me!

name: Huckle
text:
[Player], you will continue to
act with Rokusei-kun.
I will now proceed with guiding visitors to evacuation.

name: Narihito
text:
This is Great Memorias!
Rushing to the monster's location,
please transform immediately!

The heroes, enveloped in dazzling light and transformed,
listen to the situation from their operators
and begin to act.

While calming the visitors who are rushing
to the building exits and guiding them
to a safe place-

name: Rokusei
text:
...[Player],
let's head to the site too.
Please transform me into my "true form".

name: Rokusei
text:
My desire not to show my true form publicly is my own circumstance.
Even if it affects future missions,
it's not worth human lives.

name: Rokusei
text:
Like those siblings, the people who came
to Hero City, everyone's summer memories-
we have to protect them.

In stark contrast to his usual demeanor,
he speaks with a calm tone and smiles.
His resolve was already made.

[Player] cancels the transformation
using the special comms device
and checks the screen of their regular device.

As [Player] was about to approve Rokusei's transformation,
another vague silhouette
overlapped him, visible in front of their eyes.

A familiar yet unfamiliar silhouette,
similar to an event suit,
is visible within reach.

options.text: If he could fight with that suit-

text:
Reality or illusion, or an existence from a parallel universe?
[Player] unconsciously
reaches out and touches it.

New path detected.
Target: Tsuneaki
Strength: Very Strong

name: Rokusei
text: -[Player]?

The moment the transformation was approved,
the shadow in [Player]'s eyes
overlapped with Tsuneaki and turned into a red light.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
-Ehhhhhhh!?
That flimsy event suit
actually became proper!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
[Player],
your own "unique" observation ability,
it can even do something like this!?

options.text: Isn't that the form you wished for, Tsuneaki-san?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I wished for it?
Indeed, I was hoping I could fight while hiding my identity, but something like this...?

text:
A mass of water floats in the air,
hovering around him.
Rokusei recognizes it as his new Parallel Weapon.

When he puts his hand into the water mass,
it splits and changes shape,
taking on the appearance of a replica sword and a watermelon.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
However, this attire,
to call it a hero suit,
is far too-

He laughs, wondering if he's getting too carried away,
and at the same time recalls what he told [Player]
last night.

The possibility that might have visited him,
who had lived a "very ordinary" life.
A summer dream that could have been seen if he had followed a different path.

Years passed as he held onto his fleeting wish,
and it eventually became a wish so strong
that [Player] could observe it-

Realizing that this must be the case,
Rokusei smiles self-deprecatingly.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Well, it's not like I'm bad at acting
serious moments, that's not new.
I'll head to the site right away too.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
I'll gratefully use
this Parallel Weapon that
you've observed for me, [Player]!
Battle Start

While [Player] and Rokusei were heading
to the monster's location-

Mokdai was leading Canes and Sterio
and rushing towards the evacuation route.

name: Sterio
text:
-Canes, look!
Rokusei is fighting with other heroes
in different clothes than yesterday!

name: Canes
text:
Eh... it's true!
Does that mean that's Rokusei-san's
real hero suit?

Canes stops at Sterio's call.
When he turns his face in his brother's direction,
he sees two heroes fighting.

name: Narihito
text:
That's a wonderful hero suit,
isn't it the perfect Parallel Weapon
for this summer event!

name: Narihito
text:
I'm even more eager to interview you now...
Now, rookie,
let's quickly take care of this monster!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Oh, that's good, I was worried
they'd get angry and say "Did you come to play?"
when they saw me in this outfit!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Alright, this old man is going to get all fired up
and do some fan service~!

Joking around,
Rokusei throws his Parallel Weapon,
transformed into a watermelon, at the monster.

Just as it's about to hit the target and shatter,
it instantly reverts to its water mass form
and clings to the monster like mucus.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
"Secret Art",
Water Element Three-Way Fusion!

When he thrusts the replica sword, held in both hands,
towards the monster, it instantly becomes a high-pressure water stream
and pierces the monster's core.

name: Canes
text:
Amazing... Rokusei-san,
his movements are completely different from yesterday.
So cool~!

name: Sterio
text:
It's much more impactful
than watching hero lives at home~!

name: Mokdai
text:
H-hey, you two!
It's dangerous to stop moving now,
quickly get away from here-

name: Monster
text: Pigaaaah!

Just as Mokdai noticed the boys' voices
and turned around,
a monster appeared between them.

name: Canes
text: Whoa!?

name: Sterio
text: Grrr...!

Sterio stands in front of
the monster to shield Canes,
and strikes it with his large hand.

However, his hand futilely cuts through the air
as if there is nothing there.

name: Mokdai
text: You two, get down!

name: Monster
text: Pigaaooooh-

Mokdai punches the monster that attacked the boys
with all his might.

The impact shatters the body along with its core,
and the monster, flung high into the air,
disappears as particles of light.

After Mokdai saved the boys,
the monsters were subjugated by numerous heroes,
and the situation was resolved.

[Player], who received contact from Mokdai,
joins him along with Rokusei and Narihito.

name: Sterio
text:
Whine... I'm sorry.
I didn't know I couldn't touch monsters physically...

name: Canes
text:
Sorry, I'm reflecting too.
For acting on our own during evacuation-

name: Mokdai
text:
I'm sorry I made you experience something scary,
if I had researched a safer route,
that wouldn't have happened...

name: Mokdai
text:
But I'm glad you two are safe.
If you learn from this, you must never
approach or touch monsters again.

name: Narihito
text:
I see... you two didn't know
about monsters' characteristics either,
not just about heroes.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Well, it's not surprising.
In areas like developing territories with weak recognition...
Where monsters are few, it would be rare to find people who know about them.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
As far as I can tell from broadcasts,
heroes can repel monsters,
so it's understandable to think you can touch them.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
However, it was fortunate that most of the monsters
that appeared were only in their infant stage.
At least we don't have to worry about building destruction.

The boys, regretting their reckless actions, became meek.
All the heroes are glad they are safe.

name: Sterio
text:
...Hey, hey, Rokusei.
Do you have to be a hero to be able to defeat monsters?
If I can't transform, all I can do is nothing?

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
To be precise, you can't harm monsters
unless you have a Parallel Weapon
that heroes possess.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Monsters that have matured
can be touched by ordinary people,
but even then, they can't be defeated so easily.

name: Sterio
text:
But, but... I'm a "hunting dog",
and my role is to protect my siblings and family.
I'll be in trouble if I can't defeat monsters.

name: Sterio
text:
I want to be a hero,
I want to be one right now...

Sterio recalls the recent event
and continues to mutter repeatedly.
As if he was praying for his wish to be fulfilled-

name: Sterio
text:
I was abandoned somewhere.
Papa and Mama picked me up
and made me family.

name: Sterio
text:
I was given the role of a "hunting dog."
An important job to protect everyone.
My own important role-

name: Sterio
text:
But what if Muiraoka I
gets lots of monsters
like the ones just now?

name: Sterio
text:
Canes, Papa, Mama,
I won't be able to protect any of them...
I don't want that, no way!

What Sterio felt was
the anxiety of possibly losing his family, and
a sense of crisis regarding the shaking of his own raison d'être.

The near-death experience brought those feelings to the surface,
and transformed his vague thoughts into a strong wish.

A strong attachment to protect his one and only
place he believes in, takes form-

New path detected.
Target: Sterio
Strength: Very Strong

name: Sterio
text:
[Player], please!
I want to transform into a hero
and protect everyone-!

A strong light overflowing from the
parallel universe envelops Sterio and
takes a form converged by his wish.

name: Canes
text:
Sterio, you...
…………….

The display name for the following characters have been changed:
Rokusei -> "Cool Technique" Tsuneaki
